arts.ttl: 'No doubt' - Harry Maguire explains how he has resurrected his Manchester United career
arts.sum: Harry Maguire was Man United's knight in shining armour against Leicester City, heading in a late winner.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy fumes over 'unthinkable' decision in Leicester City's loss to Man United
arts.sum: “When you prepare the whole week for this game and are reacting after the Everton loss and put in a performance like that and it’s been decided on a clear and obvious mistake, that is unacceptable and unthinkable at this level. The City manager will at least walk away with the positive of having seen his team improve their performance from the 4-0 loss at Everton.

arts.ttl: 'Not Fergie time, offside time' - Leicester rue lack of VAR as Man Utd progress
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy says his Leicester side were beaten not in 2Fergie time, but offside time" as Harry Maguire's controversial late winner sends Manchester United into the FA Cup fifth round.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim reacts to Man Utd 2 Leicester City 1 in FA Cup fourth round
arts.sum: When a team doesn't perform and doesn't improve, it's the coach. Then in the second half, we played a little bit better with a little bit more speed and winning second balls.

arts.ttl: Sir Alex Ferguson is caught YAWNING on live TV in the Old Trafford stands - after Roy Keane called Man United 'boring' in Leicester FA Cup win
arts.sum: Sir Alex Ferguson was spotted yawning during the Man United's FA Cup clash with Leicester, after the club's former captain Roy Keane had branded the team 'boring'.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy says not ruling United winner out for offside ‘unacceptable’
arts.sum: United head coach Ruben Amorim acknowledged that his side rode their luck.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane savages 'bad' Man United after 'shocking' decision gifts them FA Cup win over Leicester - as Ruben Amorim admits 'it was not a good day': 'Don't be fooled!'
arts.sum: The Red Devils booked their place in the fifth round of the competition thanks to Harry Maguire 's late header on Friday. Though replays showed he was well offside, but VAR was not in use.

arts.ttl: Manchester United 2-1 Leicester City live reaction as controversial last-gasp Maguire header wins tie
arts.sum: “When you prepare the whole week for this game and are reacting after the Everton loss and put in a performance like that and it’s been decided on a clear and obvious mistake, that is unacceptable and unthinkable at this level. “It’s a hard one to take because the game was decided on a mistake.

arts.ttl: Leicester fans react as Harry Maguire scores controversial winner for Manchester United in FA Cup clash
arts.sum: Leicester City were controversially knocked out of the FA Cup by Manchester United in Friday night’s fourth-round encounter at Old Trafford. The Foxes took the...

arts.ttl: Harry Maguire's last-minute offside winner leaves Ruud van Nistelrooy RAGING - with no VAR in FA Cup fourth round
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT: Replays clearly showed that Maguire scored from an offside position. There was also plenty of grievance on the Leicester City bench for the award of the free-kick in the first place.
